name: Ninja Video Guide
description: Stuck playing Ninja Spinki??? Download the exclusive chat and video guide app for Ninja Spinki to find the fastest way to level up.  Chat with Ninja Spinki experts to learn all the best strategies, tricks, and hacks. Meet new people in chat rooms and form groups so you can team up and form Ninja groups.  The best app to watch Ninja Spinki videos as soon as they're launched.  Don't miss out!  Download the FREE app today.
